spell_list.description: Perseverance of the Divine protects the target from harm, providing a two trigger stoneskin. Upon expiration, the target is granted a reactive heal based on the amount of damage prevented.
spell_list.description_pvp: Perseverance of the Divine protects the target from harm, providing a two trigger stoneskin. Upon expiration, the target is granted a reactive heal based on the amount of damage prevented.

effect_list.description: Will absorb all damage when the amount is greater than 10% of the target's maximum health. This spell will absorb a total of 2 attacks.
Applies Stoneskin Reaction.  Lasts for 1.0 seconds.
Triggers when a Stoneskin is consumed. Suspends all other stoneskins that match the damage types of this effect.
Reduces all damage done to target by 100%
Applies Perseverance of Divinity on termination.  Lasts for 15.0 seconds.
When any damage is received this spell will cast Divine Perseverance on target.
Heals the target based on the amount of damage absorbed.
Grants a total of 2 triggers of the spell.
Cannot be modified except by direct means

spell_list.name: Perseverance of the Divine
